reviews.text: when i travel indian country side, i am not sure if i can get clean room. Ashoka in was very clean and not dusty at all. I stayed at suite room. had living room and bedroom. there was shower and bathtub. as bathtub was clean, I could have a nice bath.
reviews.title: clean hotel
Good Room..
reviews.text: the manager was very friendly and all others staffs were nice.
breakfast was fine, very keralan style. For dinner, we ate different places near the hotel. there is a big hotel next to the hotel( not joys palace). local people seem to like that restaurant.
reviews.title: reasonably good hotel

reviews.text: I went for the thrissur poonam with my son who is 1 and half year old. Before going and even in Thrissur, people told me not to bring the baby to the festival as it will be too hot, but I just went there 5pm when it was bit cooler and we could manage to arrive the vip seating area.( for foreigners) The festival was amazing. highly recommended. but ready for the post festival fireworks at 3am. it was so noisy...
reviews.title: Good hotel, staff try hard...
